subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Despite the fact that Manny Ramírez is still available, the Mets chief operating officer and general manager both say the team will not pursue any more high-priced free agents this off-season.
snippet: Despite the fact that Manny Ramírez is still available, the Mets chief operating officer and general manager both say the team will not pursue any more high-priced free agents this off-season.
